definition: abbr. for Shaanxi 陝西|陕西 province
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: The disruption of the Shensi-Kansu-Ningsia Border Region was part of their plot.
sentences.chinese: 陝甘寧邊區，是這種陰謀的一部分。

sentences.english: Before the Anti-Japanese War , there almost had no modern industry in the region.
sentences.chinese: 抗戰前陝甘寧邊區幾乎沒有近代工業。
